page.title: 18FARMS IN SOUTH MOOR
page.content: We visited 3 farms from the 5 in our area.We found out that all the farmers were {tenants}of the{National Coal {Board.}Land is of poor quality; clay over coal.Called "Mixed",they are mainly{Livestock}farms. Shortly after visiting Mr.Oxley of Stanley Burn Farm,he died.Andrea Pigg, who goes to our school,lives on Morrow Edge Farm,which is going to be demolished because the N.C.B.want the land to open-cast for coal.We think it is a shame! We saw a special herd of pedigree Limousin cows and 3 bulls at Mr. Barron's New Acres Farm. All the farmers work long hours and never have a holiday,but they enjoy their job.We would not like to work so hard.
